feature_name: Brain mode clarity and sidekicks access
scope_summary: Make Brain Mode explicit as Creative/Analytical, preserve legacy sprint values, expose direct Sidekicks entry links, and prevent the fixed zero-tracking banner from hiding Sidekicks controls on Hub surfaces.

legal_and_regulatory.rationale: UI discoverability and label updates only; no new legal processing or data handling paths.

privacy_local_first_promise.rationale: Change reduces UI obstruction by skipping the zero-tracking banner on Hub app surfaces without adding new off-device data flows.
evidence: No storage keys or network request logic added

medical_scope_and_claims.rationale: No new medical or clinical claim text added in this patch.

behavioral_science_alignment.rationale: Improves clarity and lowers cognitive friction by naming the active brain mode and giving a direct path to Sidekicks selection.
evidence: partials/header.html now displays dynamic Brain Mode label
hub.html adds explicit Open Sidekicks action

neurodivergence_research_alignment.rationale: Supports user-choice and state-matching principles by making mode state visible and Sidekicks easier to access.
evidence: assets/site.js formatBrainMode updates on-screen mode label
hub/beta/index.html nav now includes Sidekicks route

user_benefit_and_harm_check.rationale: Primary benefit is reduced confusion and fewer hidden controls; risk is low because behavior changes are limited to presentation and navigation.
evidence: Legacy mode alias maps sprint -> creative to avoid state breakage
No destructive migrations or data writes introduced

brand_voice_and_claims.rationale: Copy remains plain, direct, and non-coercive while using existing Divergify terminology for mode and sidekicks.
evidence: Hub copy explicitly points users to Sidekicks selection
Brain Mode label now uses user-facing Creative/Analytical language

accessibility_and_inclusion.rationale: Improves orientation with explicit mode text and a direct nav path to Sidekicks for keyboard and low-context users.
evidence: Header label updates in text without requiring icon interpretation

security_and_reliability.rationale: Runtime remains stable with node syntax checks and no new remote scripts or elevated permissions.
evidence: No credential, auth, or backend changes in this patch

monetization_and_dark_pattern_check.rationale: No pricing, payment, or monetization interaction was added or changed.

ship_decision.conditions: Ship as UX clarity and discoverability fix; monitor for any Hub path regressions.
